import React, { useState } from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; const RandomEdit = props => { const [name, setName] = useState(props.randomData.name) const [details, setDetails] = useState(props.randomData.details) const [box_number, setBox_Number] = useState(props.randomData.box_number) const [id, setId] = useState(props.randomData.id) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setName(name) setDetails(details) setBox_Number(box_number) const boxinfo = { name:name, details:details, box_number:box_number } props.handleUpdateRandom(boxinfo) setName('') setDetails('') setBox_Number('') setId('') } console.log(details); return (

) } export default RandomEdit
